deposit().details: Updates user balance and total deposits, then emits an event

returns._0: The contract's ETH balance in wei

params.user: The address of the user to query

transferOwnership(address).details: Only the current owner can call this function

params.newOwner: The address of the new owner

withdraw(uint256).details: Follows Checks-Effects-Interactions pattern to prevent reentrancy

params.amount: The amount of ETH to withdraw

constructor.notice: Initializes the contract and sets the deployer as the owner

deposit().notice: Allows users to deposit ETH into the vault

getContractBalance().notice: Returns the total ETH balance held by the contract

getUserBalance(address).notice: Returns the deposited balance of a specific user

owner().notice: The address of the contract owner

totalDeposits().notice: The total amount of deposits in the contract

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new owner

withdraw(uint256).notice: Allows users to withdraw their deposited ETH
